mapper.select: SELECT id, sns_type, email, status, total_exercise_time, login_date, paused_date, reg_date FROM tbl_user WHERE 1=1 AND status = 'active' AND id = #{id}
SELECT id, sns_type, email, status, total_exercise_time, login_date, paused_date, reg_date FROM tbl_user WHERE 1=1 AND status = 'active' AND email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) +1 FROM tbl_user WHERE total_exercise_time > (SELECT total_exercise_time FROM tbl_user WHERE id = #{id});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (sns_type, sns_id, email, status, login_date, reg_date, mod_date) VALUES (#{snsType}, #{snsId}, #{email}, #{status}, now(), now(), now());
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET login_date = now(), mod_date = now() WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE tbl_user SET status = 'left', left_date = now(), mod_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_user SET total_exercise_time = #{totalExerciseTime}, mod_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
